    • Uses of BufferedDevice in graphics.awt

      Classes in graphics.awt that implement BufferedDevice 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BufferedCanvas
      An extension of the Canvas class with built-in double-buffered image drawing and manipulation functions.
      class  BufferedFrame
      An extension of the Frame class with built-in double-buffered image drawing and manipulation functions.
